sub_title: Geophysicist and Team lead at Fugro Netherlands Marine
summary:
Developing innovative and sustainable solutions to the challenges of modern day society is something that I am enthusiastic about. Whether in the field of oil & gas to deal with the inevitable changes in the current energy mix, or the field of shallow subsurface to support societies in, on and around our oceans and rivers. They both have in common that detailed knowledge of the subsurface is vital to each solution. I believe I can provide that knowledge and can contribute to those solutions.

Specialties: Applied Geophysics, Borehole Acoustics, Geotechnical Borehole Logging (wireline), Borehole Seismic while drilling (Checkshot, VSP), Measurement & Logging While Drilling, Deep-Water (exploration) drilling.
